My Work Experience

Here is my work experience in Web Development and Web Design

Junior Web Developer

KI-NE-TICK Web studio

Created landing pages from PSD layouts in HTML5, CSS3. Worked on the text editor and made clean, flexible code. Created an adaptive, cross-browser, responsive websites for mobile devices. Code correction into a flexible HTML-CSS-JS code. Have an experience using jQuery library and Bootstrap framework. Created difficult object oriented programs in Javacript using AJAX/Fetch queries and JS DOM Manipulation.

Melburn, Australia

Web Designer

KI-NE-TICK Web studio

Created website designs(layouts) in Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator and using HTML5 and CSS3. Created the landing pages. Designed graphics with multiple difficult-animations. Presented initial design ideas to clients. Executed all visual design stages from concept to final Web-Product. Worked with Lead web specialists. Created wireframes, user flows and site maps to communicate interaction and design ideas.

Melburn, Australia

Middle Frontend Web developer

KI-NE-TICK Web studio

Created landing pages from PSD layouts in HTML5, CSS3 markup languages. Worked on the text editor and made clean, flexible code. Created an adaptive, cross-browser, responsive websites for mobile devices. Code correction into a flexible HTML-CSS-JS code. Have a good experience in jQuery library and Bootstrap framework. Created difficult object oriented programs in Javacript using AJAX/Fetch queries and JS DOM Manipulation.

Melburn, Australia

Lead Frontend Web Developer

KI-NE-TICK Web studio

Created landing pages from PSD layouts in HTML5, CSS3. Worked on the text editor and made clean, flexible code. Created an adaptive, cross-browser, responsive websites for mobile devices. Code correction into a flexible HTML-CSS-JS code. Focused on code quality and web pages loading speed. Have a good experience in jQuery library and Bootstrap framework. Also created several animations using Javascript(Client side) elements.

Melburn, Australia
